artist: Designer: James H. Bowen; Manufacturer: Book of Knowledge (Grolier, Inc.); Manufacturer: After J. & E. Stevens Company, Cromwell, Connecticut, 1843–1950s
description: shape resembling a shelf clock with white cat face, black ears and red bow on front; on top acrobat cat with mouse on red ball between feet; acrobat rotates into back of bank; coins fall into base
inscription:
Inscription 

on bottom: [REPRODUCED FROM ORIGINAL IN COLLECTION/ OF THE/ BOOK/ OF/ KNOWLEDGE]
on stopper: [PATD FEB 2 1875]; around stopper: [MADE IN USA]
inside face: [59..]
title: "Cat and Mouse, Cat Balancing" (reproduction) mechanical bank
